info.author: Sal Uryasev
info.description:
pyGTrends provides a way of authenticating into Google pulling down the CSV and
parsing out the parts through Python.

Version 0.81 creates a workaround to Google's new login algorithm.

See a full description here:
http://www.juiceanalytics.com/openjuice/programmatic-google-trends-api/
info.name: pyGTrends
info.summary: Python Google Trends Information Retrieval Quasi-API
info.html_description:
pyGTrends provides a way of authenticating into Google pulling down the CSV and parsing out the parts through Python.

Version 0.81 creates a workaround to Google’s new login algorithm.

See a full description here: http://www.juiceanalytics.com/openjuice/programmatic-google-trends-api/
